item.title: Farshid Varno
item.description: Intro I’m a Research Scientist with a strong technical background in HW/SW co-design and Edge AI. In summary I have: 5+ years experience as AI Research Scientist 1 years experience as Data Scientist 2+ years experience as FPGA Engineer/RTL Designer Experience Research & Industry Research Scientist, Rain August 2023–present, Montreal, Canada Design and emulation of digital hardware units to work in the next generation of Rain’s Compute-In-Memory (CIM) technology (optimized for LLMs, Convs, etc.
